title: Frequently Asked Questions
content:
FAQ # What is Rebuild.Chat? # Rebuild is a Matrix homeserver who believe the current state of events is beyond simple ammendment, hence “Rebuild”. The topic of most rooms is how to start taking action and planning what needs to be done.
How do I join Rebuild.Chat? # If you already have a Matrix homeserver, you are welcome to join via federation. Otherwise, you can create an account with us as your homeserver (with the option of joining other servers via federation as well).
